channel.title: [PI] Overloads
channel.description: I'm not sure if this is server or client sided, but since its an item im guessing client.. Well overloads are messed up, here is a picture. [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/25rfokk.jpg[/img] I'm not sure what to do, I think its something to do with the models

item.title: [PI] Overloads
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

if (itemDef.editedModelColor != null) { for (int i = 0; i < itemDef.editedModelColor.length; i++) { if (itemDef.newModelColor[i] == 0) { itemDef.newModelColor[i] = 1; } } }

Add within your definition of ‘overload’
